text: Marc Maria Frans, Viscount Eyskens (born 29 April 1933), known as Mark Eyskens , is a Belgian economist and politician in the Christian People's Party (Belgium). He briefly served as Prime Minister of Belgium for eight months in 1981. He was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 1989. == References == ==Other websites== * Official Website of the Global Panel Foundation Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian academics Category:Belgian economists Category:Belgian nobility Category:Belgian Roman Catholics Category:Christelijke Volkspartij politicians Category:Flemish politicians Category:Government ministers of Belgium Category:People from Leuven Category:Prime ministers of Belgium Category:Members of Academia Europaea
title: Mark Eyskens
